department.ch: 國際經營管理碩士學位學程
department.en: International Master of Business Administration program

goal.ch: This course is selective and taught in English. In this course, students will learn the necessary knowledge and statistical skills relate to empirical financial research. To evaluate their learning achievement, students need to submit several assignments. After finishing this class, students will learn the fundamental methodology skill and knowledge about their master theses.
goal.en: This course is selective and taught in English. In this course, students will learn the necessary knowledge and statistical skills relate to empirical financial research. To evaluate their learning achievement, students need to submit several assignments. After finishing this class, students will learn the fundamental methodology skill and knowledge about their master theses.

outline.ch:
1. Introduction to financial database
2. How to use SAS
3. Basic SAS operation
4. Summary statistics
5. Univariate analysis
6. Multivariate analysis
7. Advanced topics
outline.en:
1. Introduction to financial database
2. How to use SAS
3. Basic SAS operation
4. Summary statistics
5. Univariate analysis
6. Multivariate analysis
7. Advanced topics

textbook.ch:
English: 
Hill, R and R. Campbell. 2020. Using SAS for Econometrics, 5th. Wiley Publisher.

Chinese: 
財金計量，鍾惠民、吳壽山、周賓凰、范懷文，雙葉出版社。
SAS財金計量之應用，王萬成，新陸書局。
SAS在财务研究中的应用，林煜恩，电子工业出版社 (in Simplified Chinese)。
SAS SUGI (SAS User Group International Club) http://sugiclub.blogspot.com.

gradMethod.ch:
1. Class participation 10％
2. Class discussion 10％
3. Assignments 60％
4. Term project 20％

Week 18: Submit the final report
